v1.description: Released on November 1, 2018. This version is now Archived for reference, please use the Latest Stable Release.
Released on April 27, 2018. This version is now Archived for reference, please use the Latest Stable Release.
Released on January 26, 2018. This version is now Archived for reference, please use the Latest Stable Release.
Released on November 13, 2017. This version is now Archived for reference, please use the Latest Stable Release.

v2.description:
This is a Developer Preview of V2.1.
This set of documentation is subject to change without warning until it is formally released

modules.name: BrAPI-Core
modules.description: The BrAPI-Core module contains high level entities used for organization and management. This includes Programs, Trials, Studies, Locations, People, and Lists

modules.name: BrAPI-Phenotyping
modules.description: The BrAPI-Phenotyping module contains entities related to phenotypic observations. This includes Observation Units, Observations, Observation Variables, Traits, Scales, Methods, and Images

modules.name: BrAPI-Genotyping
modules.description: The BrAPI-Genotyping module contains entities related to genotyping analysis. This includes Samples, Markers, Variant Sets, Variants, Call Sets, Calls, References, Reads, and Vendor Orders

modules.name: BrAPI-Germplasm
modules.description: The BrAPI-Germplasm module contains entities related to germplasm management. This includes Germplasm, Germplasm Attributes, Seed Lots, Crosses, Pedigree, and Progeny

v2.description:
Released on March 11, 2020. This version is the Latest Stable Release. This version is recommended for all new development efforts.
BrAPI V2 is separated into modules to help maintain organization and consistency within the API.

modules.name: BrAPI-Core
